snippet: San Francisco averages 6.1 yards per carry entering Sunday’s game against a Giants team that has not forgotten how punishing the 49ers’ old-school ground game can be.
abstract: New York Giants are preparing to face San Francisco 49ers, team with punishing old-school running game.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco averages 6.1 yards per carry entering Sunday’s game against a Giants team that has not forgotten how punishing the 49ers’ old-school ground game can be.

headline.seo: 49ers Are Throwbacks by Throwing Less Often
headline.main: San Francisco Is a Throwback by Throwing Less Often
headline.print_headline: 49ers Are Throwbacks by Throwing Less Often
